item.title: Street light outside 404/406 lordship lane STILL not working. This has been faulty since at least August . Fix my street Ref 80002882, 4th November
item.description:
Street light outside 404/406 lordship lane STILL not working. This has been faulty since at least August . Fix my street Ref 80002882. Fault was due to be fixed by 30th October. Not fault has been erased from their site. It is scary walking along this stretch of the road even at 5pm in the evening. Unable to see in the dark . Please get this fixed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Rycott Path, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Year round bins and waste, 4th November
item.description:
All year round, these bins obstruct the entrance to York Grove at numbers 45 / 43 . Builders and residents leave their rubbish out like this. Buggies or other wheeled items cannot pass and you have to go into the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dayton Grove, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Field behind the back garden fence of approximately No. 34/36 Crouch Croft., 4th November
item.description:
Pile of fly tipped Fridges, freezers, bags of clothes and bags of bottles etc etc. I have reported it 4 times. It has been there 2/3 weeks now. I can only think it is being missed by your collectors as it is hidden by the houses in Crouch Croft but it is visible from William Barefoot Drive.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crouch Croft, Coldharbour, London
Report on FixMyStreet
